Text: I had no idea there was an "original" version, though this one is almost identical to the 2nd edit. I watched Scum growing up as a teen and the ass raping that Davis endures kept me from stepping out of line, still a good film but severely missing Mick Ford's character "Archer" and "Striper" played by Phil Daniels has long hair....other than that the quality is 10/10.
